entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Need a Reliable Way to Check to See if a Type is a Record Class #108531
  • Expose a new `JsonSerializerDefaults` that is better tailored to Azure applications. #108526
    10.0.0
  • [mono] Fix swift lowering for InlineArray when static field occurs before instance field #108522
  • [System.Text.Json] Expose a setting disallowing duplicate JSON properties #108521
    10.0.0
  • RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds at dotnet.native.wasm.mono_jiterp_tlqueue_purge_all #108519
    9.0.0
  • Dotnet core successor of System.IdentityModel.Configuration for Security Token Service #108518
  • Regression in net9.0 when calling a ServiceClient from a dynamically loaded Assembly #108517
  • Geo Spatial Analysis in .NET Core 10 #108536
  • [mono] MiniJIT System.Formats.Nrbf.Tests getting killed #108515
  • ARM64-SVE: Use INC* when incrementing with GetActiveElementCount()/CountXBitElements() #108511
  • [browser] OutOfMemoryException after bad allocation ratio #108510
    10.0.0
  • [WASI][Mono] allocating pages with alignment wastes memory #108509
    10.0.0
  • Incorrect IL2026 for [RequiresUnreferencedCode] on type deriving from A<B> where B has new() in A<T> definition #108507
    10.0.0
  • Investigate VN-based implied assertions #108504
    Future

Closed

  • JIT: nullcheck is not folded for PHI #104489
    10.0.0
  • debsums reports REPLACED for /usr/lib/mono/fsharp/FSharp.Core.dll #108505
  • [API Proposal]: DateOnly support in IsoWeek #101597
    Future
  • .NET 8: String interpolation with IPAddress has breaking change #108491
  • iOS Release can't build with CosmosDB #101967
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal] Expand ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType, HashAlgorithmType #100361
    10.0.0
  • [browser][mt] JSWebWorker crashes the runtime #102010
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove string.Trim{,Start,End}(ReadOnlySpan<char>) #108537
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108535
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Set InstructionSet_EVEX flag in altjit. #108534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix IL2104 link #108533
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Null out SSA def nodes upon removal in RBO #108530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add project to create helix work items for host tests #108529
    area-Host
  • Trim analyzer: fix member reported for generic warning #108528
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [cdac] Tighten cdac_data friend declarations #108525
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [Android] Put Java JNI function in a separate static library #108513
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • [browser] memory leak repro #108512
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix minor markdown formatting errors/inconsistencies #108508
    documentation, area-Meta, 10.0.0

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Fix wrong Region Info Names #108524
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #108496
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    Servicing-approved, blocking, blocking-clean-ci, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.36
  • JIT: remove fgAddCodeList #108527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: move funclet separation later #108456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update field references in property accessors #108413
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use VNVisitReachingVNs in more places #108420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Backport PR #108311 - Fix statics issue with barriers #108347
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix `InlineArray` swift lowering in mono #108483
    Servicing-approved, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [cdac][cdac-build-tool] Don't let msbuild rewrite the resource name #108296
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix devirtualization across genericness in the hierarchy #108470
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [aot] mono_aot_split_options: reset state after a backslash #108212
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix buffer dropped reason in ConfigurableArrayPool #108461
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Added DateOnly overload methods to IsoWeek #108479
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 10.0.0
  • Fix wrong Region Info Names #108466
    area-System.Globalization
  • Use default timeout for launching the browser in WBT #108474
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Interpreter Fixes #108485
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Allow devirt into abstract classes if we saw a non-abstract child #108379
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] fix rooting JSWebWorkerInstance #108475
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Update System.Formats.Nrbf ref sources and restore package description #108467
    Servicing-approved, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108415
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Improve software exception handling performance #108480
    tenet-performance, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix ILLink behavior for modreq types #108494
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0-staging] Sys.RT.Caching.MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler #106220
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 6.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Simplify IsComObjectType checks #108487
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • JIT: Use edge weights in `LinearScan::findPredBlockForLiveIn` #108493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Update `field` references in property accessors #108222
    area-Meta
  • Fix differences between bash and cmd versions of crossgen test script #108500
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • ILLink: Avoid warning for RUC field rooted as part of a root assembly #108498
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • use collection syntax in illink #108458
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Improve codegen around unsigned comparisons #105593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [Ppc64le] binaryformatter and tensors tests fix #108120
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • Use a more exact base class for considerGuardedDevirtualization #108497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add experimental Swift bindings for CryptoKit #108318
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Add trim annotations to System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #108464
    area-System.Configuration
  • Fix IndexOf Optimization Code #108499
    area-System.Globalization
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Read messages from binlog if process output is missing build finished message #107280
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use architecture independent code paths in Array #108449
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix vector class retrieval and type checks for binary operand APIs #107388
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono, 10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [release/8.0][no-merge][testing][infra] Verify Apple mobile platforms on iOS 17 and XCode 15 #107021
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [release/9.0] Update the component resources for the VS descriptions #108304
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • Fix LINQ Last() in ConcatNIterator to also check base case (Concat2Iterator) #108486
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [mono] Use llvm 19.1.0 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [Wasm] feat: Make boot json file configurable #108281
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [no merge][interp] align check atomic ops on wasm #106963
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/9.0] Fix handling of appending keywords to boolean schemas. #108248
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Update stepping through MulticastDelegate under the Debugger #108414
    area-VM-coreclr
